property.name: Card Text
property.value: WWF/WCW Legend Superstar Ability: Your reversals deal a maximum of 2D. When your Hybrid maneuver is unsuccessful, Bury 3- Ringside maneuvers and/or actions; when they are successful, Stack 1- Ringside cards. Your Pre-match and Mid-match Capacity are +2, and your Fortitude Rating is +1 for every 2 maneuvers in your Ringside. You cannot pack D: 1+ Pre-match cards or Frankie Takes Ho-llywood, but you can pack non-Throwback Sculpted Like a Statue. You are a Heenan Family Member.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your non-reversal Hybrid maneuvers are WCW, your opponent cannot play Shoot Counter in response to them, and your WCW maneuvers are also [Classic WWF Logo] and considered to have 'Classic' in the title. ACE: During your turn, you may reveal your bottom 3 Arsenal cards, and then choose 1 revealed non-Unique Hybrid maneuver, put it into your hand, and put the other revealed cards into your Ringside. You cannot play non-maneuver cards with titles different from the chosen card's title for the rest of the turn, and it can be played regardless of Fortitude.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reveal any number of Hand maneuvers. Arsenal Search up to that many non-reversal maneuvers. Your next 2 cards played this turn cannot be reversed. During your turn when this card is in your Ringside, you may overturn 3 cards, put this card into your Backlash, and end your turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, +1D for each of your Ringside maneuvers. When this card is D:30+, cannot be reversed by Unique cards. As an action, -30F, Bury this card and then Arsenal Search 1 other WCW card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Diva Superstar Ability: Once during each of your turns you may put your bottom Arsenal card into your hand (when you have greater Hand cards, Stack 1 Hand card). Your DDT is a Trademark Finisher instead, and your This Diva's Got Claws! in the title is a Set-up and not Heel. Your Acolyte Protection Agency is F: 0 and your opponent cannot respond to it. You can pack Tough Enough. You are a Cruiserweight.

card.name: The First WWE Female Cruiserweight Champion

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When revealed, put 1 Backlash 'Cruiserweight' Title Belt into your Ring and replace a listed Superstar with Jacqueline. During your turn you may hide this card and your next Trademark Finisher played this turn is Multi and ignore 'completely' in your opponentâ€™s reversals to it. During your turn when this card is hidden, you may RFG 1 Ring 'Cruiserweight' card and reveal this card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be blanked. Your opponent's Strikes do a maximum of 5D and his reversals to your Strikes are +1D. Your Strikes played as a Counter (to a Strike from Arsenal) are +#D, where # = the damage applied by his Strike. After damage has been applied from his reversal to your Strike, choose 1: Bury up to that many Ringside cards, he overturns that many cards, or randomly RFG up to that many of his Ringside cards. When you have 10+ lower Fortitude, choose 2 instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when you are a Diva, +3D; when you are not, this card is a High Risk and your opponent cannot play Backlash reversals to it. As an action, Bury this card and Ringside Search 1 card listed in your Ability.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cruiserweight Superstar Ability: You can pack High-Flying Style in your Backstage, it cannot be blanked, and at the end of the Pre-match phase, put that card into your Ring. Once during each of your turns, you may Flip 1 Ring card face-down and ignore 'Can only be played after...' on your next High Risk this turn without a reversal restriction from your effects. When your High Risk is successful, choose 1: Flip 1- of your Ring cards OR Flip 1 of your face-up Ring cards and then Flip 1 non-F: 0 non-Unique card in your opponent's Ring face-down. Your Back Flip is non-Unique, and you can pack Youthful Agility.

card.name: The Future of Flight is Here

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When any player Flips a card face-up, draw 1- cards. When your opponent Flips a card face-up, he discards 1 card. When you successfully play a 'Diving', 'Fly', 'Plancha', 'Rana', or 'Tope' maneuver, or a maneuver played after Springboard, ignore 'non-Unique' in your Ability until the end of the turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after From the Top Rope or a 6D+ maneuver. Flip 3- cards in your opponent's Ring face-down, and he discards until he has 0 cards in his hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is Flipped face-up, you may Bury it and then discard 2 cards.
